::Firearm::

Firearm moves over to where Spears fell, offering an arm to help her 
up.

"Striker was captured along with you," he says sadly, "We didn't 
succeed in rescuing him. I think he might be converted to the 
Trainer's side now ... permenately."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Spears::
> 
> She had her memory. Right up untill she got shot with the trainer 
> chip. After that, it was all erased.
> 
> "Well, the last thing I remember, I was fighting some bots just 
> outside the ark when Striker went down and..OH MY GOSH! STRIKER!" 
She 
> tried to get up off the table and managed to fall on the floor.
